entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
